H0.text: who invented the printing press and in what year. 1455

H1.text: who invented the printing press and in what year. 1400

H2.text: who invented the printing press and in what year. 1460

H3.text: who invented the printing press and in what year. 1440

A4.text: By 1450, the press was in operation.

A5.text: In 1452, work commenced for the Bible project after Gutenberg borrowed another 800 guilders from Fust.

A6.text: In Germany, around 1440, the goldsmith Johannes Gutenberg invented the movable-type printing press, which started the Printing Revolution.
